title: Axiomatic Proof Validation Configuration
description: Configuration parameters defining the run-time requirements for various consensus mechanisms referenced by finalized state records.

mechanisms.description: List of active consensus mechanism definitions used to verify 'requiredThreshold' and 'consensusMechanism' fields.

id.description: The identifier referenced by state validation records (e.g., PoS-V2).

minThreshold.description: The system-enforced minimum fractional stake or vote weight (must match the 'requiredThreshold' in the state record).

validationStrategy.description: How the proof weight is calculated by the validation service.

minSigners.description: Minimum number of unique signers required, regardless of stake weight (optional operational constraint).

activeMechanismId.description: The currently active mechanism ID used for new state finalization.
